english.segment1: Deliver me out of the sadness. Deliver me from all the madness. Deliver me courage to guide me. Deliver me Your strength inside me
english.segment2: CHORUS: All of my life. I've been in hiding. Wishing there was someone just like You. Now that You're here. Now that I've found You. I know that You're the One to pull me through
english.segment3: Deliver me loving and caring. Deliver me giving and sharing. Deliver me this cross that I'm bearing
english.segment4: CHORUS x2. Oh, deliver me. Oh, deliver me. Oh, deliver me. Oh, deliver me. Deliver me
english.segment5: Jesus, Jesus, how I trust You. How I've proved You o'er and o'er. Jesus, Jesus, precious Jesus. Deliver me. Come and pull me through
